Devilcat/Gatara/Riekan::

"Not very long, as Riekan informs me."  The leader of the Rogues has 
other things on his mind, however.  "Now, how is our little friend 
doing?"

By this he means Phoenix.  Gatara turns to her readouts again and 
punches up a different view - the Pred base through Phoenix's eyes.

"Not too shabby, it would seem," Riekan comments, deadpan.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Noir --
> 
> Noir straightens as Devilcat enters and watches him till he speaks. 
> As he speaks she averts her gaze, "Good to see you to Devilcat, a 
> long time eh..." She just stands there, not wanting to say anything 
> else.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Devilcat, Riekan, and Torin (who is still carrying Jayde) finally 
> > reach their destination.  Entering the base, they split up.  
Torin 
> > takes his charge to the medical bay and puts her in the CR 
> chamber.  
> > The other two head to the control room, where they find Gatara 
and 
> > Noir.
> > 
> > "Ah, Noir, good to see you up," Devilcat says, spreading his 
hands.
